title: Design and Implementation Strategies for Computer-Supported Blended Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science theories and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Utilizing technology support systems to coordinate collaborative activities in blended learning environments, facilitating flexible learning based on BYOD

learning_goals: Learners can design blended collaborative learning scenarios by integrating activities and technological tools from diverse contexts
Learners can facilitate smooth class operations using systems that automatically support group formation and activity transitions
Learners can configure execution environments for similar CSCBL scripts by applying an IMS Learning Design-based architecture

resources: Online Collaboration Tools (e.g., Google Workspace, Miro)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
